articles.author: MENAFN
articles.title: Outbreaks like coronavirus start in and spread from the edges of cities - MENAFN.COM
articles.description:
(MENAFN - The Conversation) Emerging infectious disease has much to do with how and where we live. The ongoing coronavirus is an example of the close relationships between urban development and new or re-emerging infectious diseases. 
Like the SARS pandemic o…
articles.content:

articles.title: Amerika Serikat Rilis Gambar Baru Virus Corona China Covid-19 - CNN Indonesia
articles.description: Rocky Mountain Laboratories (RML) yang berlokasi di National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID), Amerika Serikat merilis gambar virus corona.
articles.content: Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Rocky Mountain Laboratories (RML) yang berlokasi di National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID), Amerika Serikat merilis gambar virus corona novel (COVID-19).Para peneliti di RML mencitrakan sampel virus dan sel yan… [+1718 chars]

articles.title: Scientists explore why bat viruses are so deadly - Digital Journal
articles.description: The coronavirus Covid-19, which has been making global headlines is a zoonotic virus (one thought to have transferred from animal to human). The primary source could be from bats. Scientists are looking at what makes bat viruses so deadly.

articles.title: PA de Vargem Grande transfere paciente como medida contra coronavirus - Jornal da Economia
articles.description: A Prefeitura de Vargem Grande Paulista informou que neste domingo, 16, que uma paciente atendida na cidade foi transferida para outro hospital devido a uma medida preventiva contra o coronavirus (COVID-19). Segundo o governo municipal, a paciente deu entrada …
articles.content:
A Prefeitura de Vargem Grande Paulista informou que neste domingo, 16, que uma paciente atendida na cidade foi transferida para outro hospital devido a uma medida 
preventiva contra o coronavirus (COVID-19). Segundo o governo municipal, a paciente deu entrad… [+1379 chars]

articles.title: Synthèse: Si l'épidémie de nouveau coronavirus a lieu à Houston, aux États-Unis ? - Radio Chine Internationale
articles.description: Note de la rédaction : Joshua Cooper Ramo est co-directeur général et vice-président de Kissinger Associates. L'article reflète les opinions de l'auteur et pas nécessairement celles de China Media Group.
articles.content:

articles.author: Frank Chen
articles.title: Coronavirus 'lab leakage' rumors spreading | Article - Asia Times
articles.description: Outbreak ‘could have started’ in Wuhan facility, as first patient never went to wet market identified as source
articles.content: A Wuhan lab affiliated with the Chinese Academy of Sciences has sought to dispel rumors that it made and leaked the highly infectious pneumonic virus that led to the still-raging global outbreak. While Chinese President Xi Jinping was briefed about the public… [+5629 chars]

articles.title: Holiday Inn près de Heathrow sera un centre de quarantaine des coronavirus - News 24
articles.description: Une personne infectée par le coronavirus peut la transmettre avec une simple toux ou un éternuement, disent les scientifiques. Il est maintenant confirmé que près de 1 800 personnes atteintes... Read More →
articles.content:
Une personne infectée par le coronavirus peut la transmettre avec une simple toux ou un éternuement, disent les scientifiques.
Il est maintenant confirmé que près de 1 800 personnes atteintes du virus sont décédées et plus de 71 000 ont été infectées. Mais l… [+13898 chars]

articles.author: Wiebke Hollersen
articles.title: Coronavirus: Was jeder in Deutschland jetzt wissen muss - WELT
articles.description: Kaum jemand in Deutschland kommt darum herum, sich mit dem Coronavirus zu beschäftigen. Bevor hierzulande eine Erkrankungswelle ausbricht, kann sich jeder mit dem nötigen Wissen wappnen. Hier sind die wichtigsten Fakten.
articles.content: Das Coronavirus vermehrt sich im Rachen und kann leicht weitergegeben werden. Wo es sich ausbreitet, müssen sich vor allem Menschen mit Vorerkrankungen schützen. Hier sind die wichtigsten Fragen und Antworten zum Erreger in diesen Tagen auch durchaus Small-Ta… [+5401 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus: What are the symptoms and how do I protect myself? - BBC News
articles.description: The virus is spreading around the world, but what is it, how can we be protected and can it be stopped?
articles.content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
A virus causing severe lung disease that started in China has spread to other countries, including the UK.
The coronavirus had infected 70,620 people in China as of 16 February, with 1,770 of them dying.
What are the symptoms?
